title: the great tilde.team migration
author: ~ben
content:
tilde.team is now on a beeeeefy vps! 4cores, 6gb ram, and 100gb ssd space! everything is where you left it, but you will get a scary notice about a man-in-the-middle attack when you connect over ssh. (this is just because the IP address changed). the new IP is 104.223.31.252 and the ECDSA fingerprint is: 
SHA256:CoJQp1mGtYJOZscJul6Ba94o2NsuzZTUI/b76JLGy3A
for your verification purposes.
